company_profile.description: We're a language learning app that's fundamentally different - using AI to help people actually speak a language, not just learn grammar rules and vocab. Through conversations with AI tutors and penpals, discussing news in your target language, and practicing with fellow learners / friends, you get instant corrections and feedback on every interaction.
company_profile.business_model: Sylvi is different as it combines social learning with AI in ways competitors haven't achieved. Our defensibility stems from a strong community of early adopters providing invaluable feedback for our product roadmap, plus validation from prestigious institutions such as Epsom College opening up the B2B channel.
company_profile.funding_stage: I have a business that I want to scale
company_profile.how_does_your_product_contribute_to_a_he: Learning a language is rewarding as it opens up new connections, cultures, and opportunities, while providing the satisfaction of mastering a new skill. However, anxiety about making mistakes often prevents people from speaking, which is crucial for development. Sylvi transforms language learning into a confident, social experience through daily conversations with instant, private corrections - all at a fraction of the cost of private tutoring, making it more accessible.
company_profile.how_does_your_company_use_innovation__th: Sylvi uses AI to deliver a conversational language learning experience akin to how people learn in real life.
